title: APA response to ethical issues in research

content.prompt: Some studies conducted in the mid-20th century in social psychology on obedience and social roles have been criticized for not treating participants well. Which of the following best describes the response of members of the American Psychological Association to these types of ethical issues in research?

choices.label: They have developed codes of ethics for research with human participants only.
They have developed codes of ethics for research with animal subjects only.
They have developed codes of ethics for research with both human participants and animal subjects.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
